about_the_game:
7 NIGHTS KEEPER Demo

Step into the eerie world of 7 NIGHTS KEEPER in this exclusive demo. You’ll play as a caretaker tasked with surviving one night in Amaan’s mysterious mansion. In this demo, you’ll get a hands-on introduction to the core gameplay mechanics:

  • Explore a small, select portion of the mansion, including a few key rooms that set the stage for the full game.

  • Interact with Amaan’s grandmother and uncover the first hints of something strange lurking in the house.

  • Experience the VHS-inspired visuals and haunting atmosphere that define 7 NIGHTS KEEPER.

The Gameplay

This game is primarily a first-person narrative walking simulator with exploration, driving, and conversation mechanics.

Demo Content Highlights:

  • Explore part of the mansion.

  • Basic interactions with objects and NPCs.

  • Receive text messages that guide you through your tasks.

  • A glimpse of the tension and horror that awaits in the full game.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains mature themes including depictions of suicide and scenes that explore mental health struggles. While there is no nudity or explicit gore, players may encounter unsettling imagery and disturbing situations related to self-harm. The game also features strong language that may not be suitable for younger audiences. Please be aware of these themes if you have sensitivities to such content.

Recommended:

  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670 | AMD Ryzen5 1600

  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 6GB or AMD Radeon RX 580 8GB

short_description: In 7 NIGHTS KEEPER, take a job to watch over a mansion for 7 nights and uncover a horrifying secret: the elderly occupant is possessed by a demon. Survive the escalating terror and keep the darkness at bay, or become its next victim.
